text: 18.6: Ese 18.13; FG 13.45-46; 13.51; 20.26; 1 Pi 4.4Por maaŋ Zudaiŋ ga nzuaim, mbe ana buni mbararargeŋ thav hegap, ana nzɨɨv ana nzuai. Mbe ana nzɨɨv ana nzuaim, Por thav khaŋ muuŋgi, ana wo sharigi shagi vherɨna mbozav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nden ntuu zumgum vhavar ŋgirgɨp, shirga, nden simtɨk ma. Nden vhav na shigirga tuktɨgi fhu. Gu bigɨna mbatɨga thuen nde muuŋgi fhuvara. Gu ntigem nde thav, gu Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ, gu nta bun harigi ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi ga suanga.”
